name: Asteroid (Senydesu)
description:
Hello everyone, this game was done for a school project, and it's my first game in Unity. The instructions were simple, we had to do a game similar to the Asteroids arcade game from 1979 by Atari. 

You can play it with the key arrows and the W, A, S and D with your keyboard.

Tell me what you think in the comments and your score! Enjoy ^^
